DOC.brief_summary: The study will evaluate the effect of NTRA-2112 on intestinal malabsorption in preterm infants.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of NTRA-2112 on Intestinal Malabsorption in Preterm Infants
DOC.detailed_description: The study will assess the efficacy and safety of NTRA-2112 on intestinal malabsorption in preterm infants as compared to placebo
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 1. Male or female preterm infant 26 and up to 32 weeks gestation. Gestational age matching (±2 weeks) between maternal dates and/or early antenatal ultrasound 2. Birth weight ≥ 500g 3. Singleton or twin birth Exclusion Criteria 1. Complete enteral feeding
